name: Video Games Amino for Gamers
description: Video Game Amino is the fastest growing mobile social network for video game fans!  Are you a big video gamer? Do you look for news on your favorite game at least once a day? Looking forward to the yet-to-be-announced expansion? Then drop that controller for a few minutes and check out Video Games Amino!  Video Games Amino allows you to meet new friends from all over the world who share your passion. From forum posts to interactive polls, our community is active and always welcoming.  Youll find discussions, polls, and gamers talking about all of your favorite video games! Join the discussion today and meet new and exciting people who share your interests!  Features: -Chat about your favorite game, discuss strategy, and find gaming partners. -Share engaging content to get answers and start discussions on your favorite gaming topics. -Start conversations with other gamers from around the world and make long lasting friendships! -Post gaming tips, videos, collections, or special gaming moments that you want to share!  How users take full advantage of Video Game Amino: - Stuck on a mission or level? Post a question or lend a hand to someone who may need help. - Search for gamers in your area or across the globe in an instant with our discover feature. - Think you know which gaming console is the best? Make a poll and see who agrees. - Chat About new and upcoming video games!  - Customize your profile to express your gaming identity.  Come find us on the web: http://www.aminoapps.com/
